headline: Gold Plunges From Record High With Biggest One-Day Decline in 12 Years
summary: Gold's year-long rally hit a wall Tuesday, with the price of the precious metal falling the most it has in a dozen years.

content.title: Gold Plunges From Record High With Biggest One-Day Decline in 12 Years
content.summary: Gold's year-long rally hit a wall Tuesday, with the price of the precious metal falling the most it has in a dozen years.

thumbnail.caption: Matt Jelonek / Bloomberg / Getty Images Gold prices had hit a series of record highs in recent months amid economic uncertainty and stock market volatility.

headline: Gold Is Crashing—and Taking Newmont Stock With It
summary: With  behaving more like a growth stock than a safe-haven asset, a bit of volatility was bound to hit at some point.  Gold continuous contract  prices for October delivery fell 5.7%, or 248.70, to $4,087.70 per troy ounce on Tuesday, its largest one-day dollar decline on record and its largest one-day percentage decline since June 20, 2013, according to Dow Jones Market Data.  The most active gold price closed down 5.7% at $4,109.10, its lowest close since Oct. 10, in its largest one-day decline on record and its largest percentage decline since June 20, 2013.

content.title: Gold Is Crashing—and Taking Newmont Stock With It
content.summary: With  behaving more like a growth stock than a safe-haven asset, a bit of volatility was bound to hit at some point.  Gold continuous contract  prices for October delivery fell 5.7%, or 248.70, to $4,087.70 per troy ounce on Tuesday, its largest one-day dollar decline on record and its largest one-day percentage decline since June 20, 2013, according to Dow Jones Market Data.  The most active gold price closed down 5.7% at $4,109.10, its lowest close since Oct. 10, in its largest one-day decline on record and its largest percentage decline since June 20, 2013.

headline: Gold Price Suffers Worst Day in More Than a Decade; Silver, Platinum Drop
summary: Silver futures, which ended Monday at the second-highest level on record, pulled back even more sharply, and platinum prices also sank.  The most-active gold futures contract traded 5.7% lower to $4,109.10 a troy ounce.  The front-month contract for silver sank 7.2% to $47.45 a troy ounce.

content.title: Gold Price Suffers Worst Day in More Than a Decade; Silver, Platinum Drop

headline: Tradr to Launch Leveraged ETFs on BLSH, DASH, FLY, IREN, NEM, OPEN, QS, SRPT & WULF
summary: Tradr ETFs, a provider of ETFs designed for sophisticated investors and professional traders, announced that it expects to launch nine new single stock leveraged ETFs on Thursday, October 23. The funds will be listed on Cboe, and each ETF aims to deliver twice (200%) the daily performance of its specific underlying stock.

content.title: Tradr to Launch Leveraged ETFs on BLSH, DASH, FLY, IREN, NEM, OPEN, QS, SRPT & WULF
content.summary: Tradr ETFs, a provider of ETFs designed for sophisticated investors and professional traders, announced that it expects to launch nine new single stock leveraged ETFs on Thursday, October 23. The funds will be listed on Cboe, and each ETF aims to deliver twice (200%) the daily performance of its specific underlying stock.

headline: Inflation Data; Intel and Tesla Earnings: What to Watch This Week
summary: The U.S. government shutdown continues, but investors won't be completely starved for economic data. Friday brings a delayed look at September’s consumer-price index, a key inflation reading that will factor into the Federal Reserve’s next decision on interest rates.

content.title: Inflation Data; Intel and Tesla Earnings: What to Watch This Week
content.summary: The U.S. government shutdown continues, but investors won't be completely starved for economic data. Friday brings a delayed look at September’s consumer-price index, a key inflation reading that will factor into the Federal Reserve’s next decision on interest rates.
